channel.title: SlideShows of the Day
channel.description: SlideShare feed for SlideShows of the Day

item.title: Glen Sanford: Engineering for Real-Time at Twitter
item.description: I gave this talk at UC Davis on behalf of Twitter on 10/18/11. It was based on a talk Raffi Krikorian gave earlier this year at Stanford. (http://www.slideshare.net/raffikrikorian/twitter-engineering-for-realtime-stanford-acm-2011). It’s an overview of the path of a Tweet through Twitter.
item.content:encoded: I gave this talk at UC Davis on behalf of Twitter on 10/18/11. It was based on a talk Raffi Krikorian gave earlier this year at Stanford. (http://www.slideshare.net/raffikrikorian/twitter-engineering-for-realtime-stanford-acm-2011). It’s an overview of the path of a Tweet through Twitter.
item.author: 9len@slideshare.net(9len)

item.title: Designing for Tablet Experiences (Henrik Olsen)
item.description: Henrik Olsen’s presentation from Web 2.0 Expo New York: If you’re ready to jump into designing for tablets, this will be a great two-part workshop for you. Given the mass adoption of tablet devices over this past year,this workshop has been created to present the fundamentals of designing tablet applications as well as tablet optimized web sites. Learn from a leader in adopting classic design principles to the rapidly evolving world of tablets.
item.content:encoded: Henrik Olsen’s presentation from Web 2.0 Expo New York: If you’re ready to jump into designing for tablets, this will be a great two-part workshop for you. Given the mass adoption of tablet devices over this past year,this workshop has been created to present the fundamentals of designing tablet applications as well as tablet optimized web sites. Learn from a leader in adopting classic design principles to the rapidly evolving world of tablets.
item.author: hotstudio@slideshare.net(hotstudio)

media:content.media:title: Designing for Tablet Experiences (Henrik Olsen)
media:content.media:description:
Henrik Olsen's presentation from Web 2.0 Expo New York:
If you’re ready to jump into designing for tablets, this will be a great two-part workshop for you. Given the mass adoption of tablet devices over this past year,this workshop has been created to present the fundamentals of designing tablet applications as well as tablet optimized web sites. Learn from a leader in adopting classic design principles to the rapidly evolving world of tablets.
media:content.media:text: Henrik Olsen’s presentation from Web 2.0 Expo New York: If you’re ready to jump into designing for tablets, this will be a great two-part workshop for you. Given the mass adoption of tablet devices over this past year,this workshop has been created to present the fundamentals of designing tablet applications as well as tablet optimized web sites. Learn from a leader in adopting classic design principles to the rapidly evolving world of tablets.

Designing for Tablet Experiences (Henrik Olsen)

item.title: The Power of foursquare: 7 Innovative Ways to Get Your Customers to Check In Wherever They Are
item.description: In his new book, author and communications coach Carmine Gallo has told the phenomenal story of foursquare a location based system that is revolutionizing how businesses large and small can attract, engage and reward their customers. This show walks you through what foursquare is and how you can easily apply it to your marketing efforts.
item.content:encoded: In his new book, author and communications coach Carmine Gallo has told the phenomenal story of foursquare a location based system that is revolutionizing how businesses large and small can attract, engage and reward their customers. This show walks you through what foursquare is and how you can easily apply it to your marketing efforts.

item.title: The labors of Heracles
item.description: I am sure that you will agree with me that, with the economic crisis on the one hand and the digital revolution on the other, every advertising professional has the right to feel like a HERO. Therefore I will use the greatest hero of the past as an example for the future.
item.content:encoded: I am sure that you will agree with me that, with the economic crisis on the one hand and the digital revolution on the other, every advertising professional has the right to feel like a HERO. Therefore I will use the greatest hero of the past as an example for the future.

item.title: Paris Web - Javascript as a programming language
item.description: How to setup up a stable javascript continuous integration environment and why you need it. Through a real life example, the talk explains all the benefits of having a development process that brings real control over javascript codebase. A deep analysis of developer and webapps needs and of the tools that fit those requirements.
item.content:encoded: How to setup up a stable javascript continuous integration environment and why you need it. Through a real life example, the talk explains all the benefits of having a development process that brings real control over javascript codebase. A deep analysis of developer and webapps needs and of the tools that fit those requirements.
item.author: cedmax@slideshare.net(cedmax)
